description: The man was found unresponsive after the crash outside a Spar convenience store, police say.
title: Preston crash: Driver dies after hitting bollard
title_page: Preston crash: Driver dies after hitting bollard - BBC News
maintext:
A driver has died after his car hit a bollard, police have said.
He was found unresponsive by emergency crews following the crash in Woodplumpton Road, Preston, at about 08:40 GMT.
The man was taken to hospital where he was pronounced dead.
While appealing for information or camera footage, Det Supt Matt Davidson from Lancashire Police said: "First and foremost our thoughts are with the family of the man involved in the collision this morning."
